short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help Indie maker to tracker their submission to different directory

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indie Maker need to submit their tools to different directory sites. this tool has a list of sites and will help them to tracker which tool submitted to how many sites. Make it more easier to handle multiple tools
